title: OCUhome Smartwatch Screen Replacement Kit, Precise Out Front LCD Glass Cover Replacement UV Glue Touch Screen Repair Kit Compatible with Apple Watch 38mm (Series 3)
features: Material: Phone glass repair kit is made of high quality tempered glass, with top quality and oleophobic coating, can perfectly replace the original touch screen glass.It is used to damage the outer glass of the smart watch, there is no LCD screen and touch function, only glass.
Function: This product is mainly used to replace the external glass of your smartwatch, if your watch screen is broken, you can use this product to replace it perfectly with a great deal.
Compatibility: Watch replacement glass Compatible with Apple Watch Series 2/3/4/5/6 series 38mm 42mm 40mm 44mm.
Product List:1 Set Of Opening Tools, 1 X UV Lamp, 1 X Tweezers, 1 X Tempered Film, 1 X Sticker, 2 X Plastic Handles, 1 X 5ml UV LOCA Glue, 1 X Molybdenum Alloy Wire, 1 X Touch Screen Glass Cover.

Service: 100% after-sales service, if you are interested in our glass repair kit, you can go into the store to browse, we have a large number of electronic products in the store, such as: Watch Band, True Wireless Earbuds, Wireless Mouse, Gaming Mouse Pad, PBT Keycaps and so on.
description: Description:A full set of tools help to safely open the watch without damaging the watch cover.It is used to replace damaged or worn parts on the watch.Made of high quality glass material, the watch cover is durable to use.The length of the product is 5cm,the width is 4cm, and the thickness is 0.3cm.Item Name: Touch Screen Glass CoverMaterial:GlassNotes:Due to the light and screen setting difference, the product's color may be slightly different from the pictures.Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement.This part is only used to replace the external glass, and professional installation is recommended.If you try to repair it yourself, you will be responsible for the consequences.It is used to replace the damaged the outer glass of the smart watch. There is no function of LCD screen and touch screen.If the outer glass of your watch is damaged, the display can still show, you can buy it to replace it.Replacing the outer glass is not an easy task, and we are not responsible for any damage caused during installation.The product is made of high-quality tempered glass with top quality and oleo-phobic coating, which can perfectly replace the original touch screen glass.Package Includes:1 Set Of Opening Tools1 X UV Lamp1 X Tweezers1 X Tempered Film1 X Sticker2 X Plastic Handles1 X 5ml UV LOCA Glue1 X Molybdenum Alloy Wire1 X Touch Screen Glass Cover
